LanguageData.RimPlas_Barrier.label: RimPlas Barrier
LanguageData.RimPlas_Barrier.description: RimPlas barrier that provides some cover and protection. Easy and quick to construct but slightly flammable. Lighter but less robust than sandbags
LanguageData.RimPlas_Barrier_Blueprint.label: RimPlas Barrier (blueprint)
LanguageData.RimPlas_Barrier_Blueprint_Install.label: RimPlas Barrier (blueprint)
LanguageData.RimPlas_Barrier_Frame.label: RimPlas Barrier (building)
LanguageData.RimPlas_Barrier_Frame.description: RimPlas barrier that provides some cover and protection. Easy and quick to construct but slightly flammable. Lighter but less robust than sandbags
LanguageData.RimPlas_AnimalSleepingBox.label: RimPlas Animal Box
LanguageData.RimPlas_AnimalSleepingBox.description: A small box for animals to sleep in. Fits smaller animals like chickens, cats, or small dogs.
LanguageData.RimPlas_Stool.label: RimPlas Stool
LanguageData.RimPlas_Stool.description: A simple platform on which to sit. Not very comfortable, but much better than nothing. Can be used at tables, work stations, and elsewhere.
LanguageData.RimPlas_DiningChair.label: RimPlas Dining Chair
LanguageData.RimPlas_DiningChair.description: A comfortable and attractive chair. Can be used at tables, work stations, and elsewhere.
LanguageData.RimPlas_DrugCabinet.label: RimPlas Drug Cabinet
LanguageData.RimPlas_DrugCabinet.description: A small cabinet to store drugs. Includes a small cleanliness boost and a production boost to drug lab benches.
LanguageData.RimPlas_EndTable.label: RimPlas End Table
LanguageData.RimPlas_EndTable.description: A small bedside table which makes nearby beds a little bit more comfortable. Must be placed directly adjacent to the head of the bed. Placing more than one end table near the same bed has no effect.
LanguageData.RimPlas_Table_Tiny.label: Rimplas Table (1x1)
LanguageData.RimPlas_Table_Tiny.description: People eat off tables when chairs are placed facing them.
LanguageData.RimPlas_Table_Small.label: RimPlas Table (1x2)
LanguageData.RimPlas_Table_Small.description: People eat off tables when chairs are placed facing them.
LanguageData.RimPlas_PlantPot.label: RimPlas Plant Pot
LanguageData.RimPlas_PlantPot.description: Plant decorative flowers here to improve the mood of people nearby.
LanguageData.RimPlas_Shelf.label: RimPlas Shelf
LanguageData.RimPlas_Shelf.description: A shelf for storing miscellaneous items. Items stored in this will not deteriorate, even if outside.
LanguageData.RimPlas_Rack.label: RimPlas Small Shelf
LanguageData.RimPlas_Rack.description: Items stored in this will not deteriorate, even if outside.
LanguageData.RimPlas_Dresser.label: RimPlas Dresser
LanguageData.RimPlas_Dresser.description: A dresser. Gives a small comfort bonus to all nearby beds. Placing more than one dresser near the same bed has no effect.
LanguageData.RimPlas_GameOfUr.label: RimPlas Game-of-Ur board
LanguageData.RimPlas_GameOfUr.description: Dating from 2500BC, this exciting yet infuriating board game can be played by one or two people. It trains intellectual skills.
LanguageData.RimPlas_ChessTable.label: RimPlas Chess Table
LanguageData.RimPlas_ChessTable.description: The ancient game of kings. Fun for a few hours here and there, even playing alone. It trains intellectual skills.
